au.com.addstar.monolith.util

Class PotionUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.com.addstar.monolith.util.PotionUtil

  • public class PotionUtil
extends Object
    This class lets you get the potion type from a potion item stack, using the NBT tags introduced in Minecraft 1.9

    Source: https://gist.github.com/forseth11/31b914badd376dbd38e2

    Author:
    Michael Forseth

      • apply

        public void apply(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack to)
           throws Exception
        Applies the effects of this potion to the given ItemStack. The ItemStack must be a potion.
        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • toItemStack

        public org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack toItemStack(int amount)
        This converts PotionInfo to an ItemStack NOTICE: This does not allow a way to change the level of the potion. This will work for only default minecraft potions.
        Parameters:
        amount -
        Returns:
        ItemStack of a potion. NULL if it fails.

      • fromItemStack

        public static PotionUtil fromItemStack(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
        This parses an ItemStack into an instance of PotionInfo. This lets you get the potion type, if the potion is strong, if the potion is long, if the potion is lingering, and if the potion is a splash potion.
        Parameters:
        item -
        Returns:
        PotionInfo. If it fails to parse, or the item argument is not a valid potion this will return null.
